Params[3]: Given it's an important mission, I was ordered to offer my support to the Gray Raven.
Thank you, I'm sure it'll go well.
I asked her to stay at the base to avoid unnecessary issues.
Wise move. I'm afraid the application for infrastructure reconstruction has not yet been approved due to Karenina's sudden visit.
I found the infrastructure materials you asked for earlier...
You're both here to assist us in this mission. Please drop your weapons!
...Hmph, I'll do it for the sake of Lucia.
Are you two okay? Karenina was not even here...
